DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Face Paints - Pale Yellow 233 (2.54 oz/75 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
Classic Pale Yellow Face Paint from Snazaroo applies evenly like glass and can be easily blended into the skin. The Snazaroo Face paint colors dry in about 30 seconds so they are a streak-free, polished and durable finish. Snazaroo "Classic" Face Paints are Snazaroo's traditional colors.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting U.S. FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is a non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and washes off easily.
Snazaroo Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage and comes in a 2.54 ounces (75 ml) size container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2.54 ounces (75 ml) Snazaroo Pale Yellow Face Paint Container is good for 450 full faces or 11,250 cheek art designs (approx 2in x 2in size)
Applies easily and smoothly and dries in about 30 seconds
Non-toxic, hypoallergenic, and the most child friendly face paint on the market
Water based face paint--easy to apply and easy to remove; just use soap and water
